title.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIU) Advanced Wireroom Analyst Course

description.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIU) Advanced Wireroom Analyst Course; This week long course is designed for SIU analyst and investigators who are working on complex, international, wiretap investigations. Investigators learn how to utilize different software tools in order to conduct toll analysis and construct organizational charts. Participants learn to focus their investigative efforts on productive phone lines and how to properly document and interpret intercepted telephone conversations. Finally, participants learn the legal concept of conspiracy and how to apply it to their investigations.
